description.lang: Qolsys' IQ Outlet is a Z-Wave Plus certified device with S2 security and SmartStart. The IQ Outlet can be used to turn On or Off lamps or AC operated appliances. Each Z-Wave device also serves as a node to repeat the signal in the network, thus, extending the overall Z-Wave mesh wireless network range.Additional Features: Works with incandescent, CFL & LED lights & appliances Plugs into Standard AC outlet Remotely or manually turns ON or OFF lights LED backlit On/Off button Control lights or appliances via schedule or remotely Second wall AC outlet remains free Works with any gateway supporting Z-Wave
1. Z-Wave Plus Lifeline2. Device Reset Locally Notification

The LED indicator will be OFF when the connected light is ON and vice versa.When value =0 the LED indicator will be OFF when the the connected light is ON, and the LED will be ON when the connected light is OFF. If value =1 the LED indicator will be ON when the connected light is ON, and the LED indicator will be OFF when the connected light is OFF. If value =2 the LED indicator will always be OFF regardless of the load status

When value =0 the LED indicator will be OFF when the the connected light is ON, and the LED will be ON when the connected light is OFF. If value =1 the LED indicator will be ON when the connected light is ON, and the LED indicator will be OFF when the connected light is OFF. If value =2 the LED indicator will always be OFF regardless of the load status
